thread.title: AirAsia offers up to 50% discount on Asean routes
thread.title_full: AirAsia offers up to 50% discount on Asean routes

title: AirAsia offers up to 50% discount on Asean routes
text:
Wednesday, 15 February 2017 | MYT 1:13 PM AirAsia offers up to 50% discount on Asean routes 
SEPANG: AirAsia is offering a 50-hour flash sale with up to 50 per cent off on all Asean destinations. 
The booking period for the sale is from Feb 15 at 10am till noon on Feb 17. 
The flash sale is available across the region and bookings can be made through airasia.com as well as the AirAsia mobile app. 
In supporting the year-long Visit Asean@50 initiative as the Asean Airline Partner, AirAsia also launched the ‘Live Life Unexpected’ campaign to encourage travellers to live the unique Asean experience through its network of 80 destinations across Southeast Asia. 
Through this, AirAsia will be implementing monthly promotions with low fares across all markets with the 50% flash sale to kick-start the Visit Asean@50 campaign. 
“As the airline partner, we hope to promote Asean as a single yet diverse destination to as many people as possible," said AirAsia head of commercial Spencer Lee. 
He said AirAsia is the only airline that flies directly to all 10 Asean countries, and will significantly contribute to the target of 121 million tourist arrivals into the region this year in celebration of Asean’s 50th anniversary. 
"With an exciting line-up of 50 festivals and 50 most unforgettable travel experiences jointly developed by national tourism organisations in Asean for the Visit Asean@50 campaign, there really is no better time than now to explore the region," said Lee. 
Travellers also have the option of experiencing the Asean region through the AirAsia Asean Pass which allows guests to enjoy flights within the region at fixed rates. <>
